section.title: Enter New Breeder Bill of Materials
section.para: To enter a new Breeder Bill of Materials, select "Enter New Breeder Bill of Materials" option. The following screen will appear:

mediaobject.caption: Create New Breeder Bill of Materials

section.para: When creating a new Breeder Bill of Materials, you are presented with the following options:

listitem.para: Enter the Item Number of the Breeder Item you want to create a Breeder Bill of Materials for.

varlistentry.term:
components expired from breeder bill
breeder items expiration in breeder bills Show Expired Components

listitem.para: Expired Components: Select to display expired components in the "Co-Product/By-Product Definitions" display.
Expired components are components that have been expired from the Breeder Bill of Materials.

varlistentry.term: breeder items adding to bills in future Show Future Components

listitem.para: Future Components: Select to display future components in the "Co-Product/By-Product Definitions" display.
Future components are components that will be added to the Breeder Bill of Materials at a future point in time.

varlistentry.term:
costing for co-products
breeder items cost absorption by
co-products costs absorbed by Costs Absorbed

listitem.para: Displays the percentage amount of Cost absorption each Co-Product will assume.

varlistentry.term:
breeder items as co-products
breeder items as by-products
co-products in breeder bills
by-products in breeder bills Co-Product/By-Product Definitions

listitem.para: Display lists all the component Items in the Breeder Bill of Materials.

section.para: To the far right of the screen, the following buttons are available:

listitem.para: Closes the screen, returning you to the application desktop.
Runs the report associated with this screen.
Opens screen for creating a new component Item.

Enables you to edit highlighted component Items. The edit screen is the same as that for creating a new component Item--except that when editing, the fields will contain component Item information. Double-clicking on a component Item will also bring you to the editing screen.
Highlight a component Item and then select this button to reach a read-only view of the "Edit" screen.
Highlight a component Item and then select this button to remove the Item from the list.
